item.title: About
item.description: Hi! My name is Renzo Cammi I was born in Argentina and currently living in Buenos Aires. I spent my childhood living in many countries of South America. I am ending my career in surveying engineering in the University of Buenos Aires (UBA). Self-taught coding in Python and applying it to Sports Analytics.

item.title: La Copa America 2021 de Brasil en números
item.description: Brasil hace 18 partidos que no pierde y la última vez que lo hizo en su propio país fue ante Países Bajos por el tercer puesto del Mundial del 2014. Desde entonces no conoce la derrota el ahora actual equipo de Tite. Sus números en la actual Copa América 2021 reflejan un equipo superior a sus rivales en la mayoría de los aspectos. No obstante, el rendimiento del equipo fue de mayor a menor.

item.title: Players Scouting Tool
item.description: Scouting Tool is a web application that lets you search, find, and analyze football players within the Top 5 European Leagues. The application is built with python library Streamlit. The open data is scraped from Statsbomb via FBref and Transfermarkt for seasons 2017-18 to 2020-21. Only field players with more than 900 minutes in each season were considered. Event values are adjusted per 90 minutes and for the moment defensive metrics are not adjusted by squad possession.

item.title: Top 10 defensive players of Superliga in season 2019/20
item.description: Looking at the defensive facet of the game is not an easy approach using metrics. Firstly, teams that have more the ball will have fewer defensive actions per game. Therefore, all defensive metrics must be adjusted by the possession of the team. Secondly, there are not many metrics at the current moment that describe the way teams defend. Nevertheless, it is known that the best way to adjust defensive actions by possession is by applying the effective time possession of each team.

item.title: Champions League squad directness in season 2019/20
item.description: Comparing ball posession against progessive passes you can get a certain style of play of a squad. For example less posession and hight progessive passes tend to induce more direct teams.

item.title: Champions League squad pressures in season 2019/20
item.description: How champions league (season 2019/20) qualified squads like to pressure in three different zones of the pitch. The dataset was scraped from FBref. FBref describes pressures as “number of times applying pressure to opposing player who is receiving, carrying or releasing the ball in 1/3 of the pitch”. Dividing each value by the total number of pressures made, we calculate the percentage applied in each third of the field. Link to Github Repository

item.title: Superliga season 2019/20 squads distribution of time played by age
item.description: How playing time of players is distributed in Superliga Argentina squads. The teams are organized by their final position in the league. It also gives information about the average age of each team and how many points they were able to sum. The leagues average is 25.7 years old. Although the league of Argentina has an export profile, most teams can hold players in their prime age (25.7 yrs old average age).

item.title: Leed's United journey back to Premier League
item.description: After 16 years Leed’s United returns to Premier League. Using data from FBref I was able to graph a simple line plot to show the long journey Leed’s had to take. Link to Github Repository
